biotools.summary: Bi-channel image registration and deep-learning segmentation (BIRDS) is a tool for efficient, versatile 3D mapping of mouse brain. It is an open source automation pipeline suitable for brain data from different microscopy platforms.

bioschemas.name: BIRDS
bioschemas.summary: Bi-channel image registration and deep-learning segmentation (BIRDS) is a tool for efficient, versatile 3D mapping of mouse brain. It is an open source automation pipeline suitable for brain data from different microscopy platforms.
